name: Preservation Improvements
desc: Other nations have implemented better preservation techniques, and have donated food to alleviate shortages

name: Water Supply Improvements
desc: Better water supply techniques have been implemented, so water is more readily available than in the past.

name: Farm Intergration Improvements
desc: Farming techinques have been come easier to track and implement.

name: Food Synthesis: Industrial
desc: Large food synthesizers to help feed this nation. Food insecurity has been greatly reduce as there are many of them around your nation.

name: Terraforming Project
desc: Terraforming a distressed area in order to create a more beneficial environment.

name: Food Synthesis: Individual
desc: Individualized food synthesizers to help feed every citizen. Food insecurity is nearly a thing of the past in this nation.

name: Anti-Radiation Treatment On-Site Clinic
desc: Major breakthoughs in Anti-Radiation Treatments are now able to be deployed to Crisis.

name: Scientist Augmentation
desc: Neuro-upgrades for your secret labs' scientists.

name: Robot Nursing Clinic
desc: Robot nurses are sent into crisis. This allows for safer, easier, and quicker response, distributing medical care.

name: Robo-Urgent Care Centers
desc: Stable, always available Urgent Care centers have opened nation-wide, equipped with amazing robotic doctors with Baymax levels of diagnosing.

name: Beginning AI Processing Units
desc: AI computers increase computation speed.

name: Landfill Removers
desc: Materials deconstructed eats away at landfills.

name: Better AI Processing Units
desc: AI computers increase computation speed.

name: Short Term Weather Redirect
desc: Local weather patterns change in your favor. Unknown global effects.

name: Holo VR Centers
desc: Like the early Holodeck, these centers allow for life like interactions with digital enities. They also allow for those seperated by distance to have in-person interactions.

name: Arc Cities
desc: ARC-like cities, these structures hold entire large communities with every small ecological and physical footprint.

name: Towers of Bable
desc: Monolithic structures that can hold many more things than we can think of.

name: Space-Ground Docks
desc: Monolithic structures which attempt to bridge Space to the very Earth.

name: Greg, the Super Computer Scientist
desc: Greg, your friendly neighborhood scientist, has signed up to work in your lab

name: TeleCircle
desc: As you watch them, the particles are constantly changing where they are.

name: Auto-Vehicles Networking
desc: You are slowly helping make the world a safer place, a place free from communter nightmares and far fewer crashes.

name: Workforce: Droid
desc: Robots programmed reminiscent of the 3 Laws are now integrated and optimized into your workforce.
